fullText:
Neovim is just not my style. 

I used it for 6 months straight. I didn’t cheat. I didn’t use anything else.

I felt I was used to it.

Then I had to write some code on somebody else’s computer. He had Vidual Studio Code. 

I realized right there I had to go back.
